verses.verse: If <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H1589>steal<s%> an <S%H7794>ox,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> and <S%H2873>kill<s%> it, <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4376>sell<s%> it; he shall <S%H7999>restore<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> an <S%H7794>ox,<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> a <S%H7716>sheep.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> a <S%H1590>thief<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> breaking <S%H4290>up,<s%> and be <S%H5221>smitten<s%> that he <S%H4191>die,<s%> there shall <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> be shed for him.

If <S%H518><s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> be <S%H2224>risen<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, there shall be <S%H1818>blood<s%> shed for him; for he should make full <S%H7999>restitution;<s%> <S%H7999><s%> <S%H518>if<s%> he have <S%H369>nothing,<s%> then he shall be <S%H4376>sold<s%> for his <S%H1591>theft.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> the <S%H1591>theft<s%> be certainly <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H4672><s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H2416>alive,<s%> whether it be <S%H4480>ox,<s%> <S%H7794><s%> <S%H5704>or<s%> <S%H2543>ass,<s%> <S%H5704>or<s%> <S%H7716>sheep;<s%> he shall <S%H7999>restore<s%> <S%H8147>double.<s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall cause a <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> to be <S%H1197>eaten,<s%> and shall put <S%H7971>in<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1165>beast,<s%> and shall <S%H1197>feed<s%> in another <S%H312>man's<s%> <S%H7704>field;<s%> of the <S%H4315>best<s%> of his own <S%H7704>field,<s%> and of the <S%H4315>best<s%> of his own <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> shall he make <S%H7999>restitution.<s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> break <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H4672>catch<s%> in <S%H6975>thorns,<s%> so that the staches of <S%H1430>corn,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the standing <S%H7054>corn,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H7704>field,<s%> be <S%H398>consumed<s%> therewith; he that <S%H1197>kindled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1200>fire<s%> shall surely make <S%H7999>restitution.<s%> <S%H7999><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3627>stuff<s%> to <S%H8104>keep,<s%> and it be <S%H1589>stolen<s%> out of the man's <S%H4480>house;<s%> <S%H1004><s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H1590>thief<s%> be <S%H4672>found,<s%> let him <S%H7999>pay<s%> <S%H8147>double.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> the <S%H1590>thief<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4672>found,<s%> then the <S%H1167>master<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H430>judges,<s%> to see <S%H518>whether<s%> <S%H3808><s%> he have <S%H7971>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H4399>goods.<s%>

For <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1697>manner<s%> of <S%H6588>trespass,<s%> whether it be <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H7794>ox,<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H2543>ass,<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H8008>raiment,<s%> or <S%H5921>for<s%> any <S%H3605>manner<s%> of lost <S%H9>thing,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> another <S%H559>challengeth<s%> to be <S%H3588>his,<s%> <S%H1931><s%> <S%H2088><s%> the <S%H1697>cause<s%> of both <S%H8147>parties<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5704>before<s%> the <S%H430>judges;<s%> and <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H430>judges<s%> shall <S%H7561>condemn,<s%> he shall <S%H7999>pay<s%> <S%H8147>double<s%> unto his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> an <S%H2543>ass,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> an <S%H7794>ox,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> or <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep;<s%> and it <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> be <S%H7665>hurt,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> driven <S%H7617>away,<s%> no <S%H369>man<s%> <S%H7200>seeing<s%> it:

Then shall an <S%H7621>oath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> them <S%H8147>both,<s%> <S%H518>that<s%> he hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7971>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H4399>goods;<s%> and the <S%H1167>owner<s%> of it shall <S%H3947>accept<s%> thereof, and he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> make it <S%H7999>good.<s%>
And <S%H518>if<s%> it be <S%H1589>stolen<s%> <S%H1589><s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> him, he shall make <S%H7999>restitution<s%> unto the <S%H1167>owner<s%> thereof.

If <S%H518><s%> it be torn in <S%H2963>pieces,<s%> <S%H2963><s%> then let him <S%H935>bring<s%> it for <S%H5707>witness,<s%> and he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> make <S%H7999>good<s%> that which was <S%H2966>torn.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7592>borrow<s%> aught <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5973><s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and it be <S%H7665>hurt,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> the <S%H1167>owner<s%> thereof being <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> it, he shall surely make it <S%H7999>good.<s%> <S%H7999><s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H1167>owner<s%> thereof be <S%H5973>with<s%> it, he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> make it <S%H7999>good:<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> be a <S%H7916>hired<s%> thing, it <S%H935>came<s%> for his <S%H7939>hire.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6601>entice<s%> a <S%H1330>maid<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H781>betrothed,<s%> and <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> her, he shall surely <S%H4117>endow<s%> <S%H4117><s%> her to be his <S%H802>wife.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> her <S%H1>father<s%> utterly <S%H3985>refuse<s%> <S%H3985><s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> her unto him, he shall <S%H8254>pay<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> according to the <S%H4119>dowry<s%> of <S%H1330>virgins.<s%>
Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> suffer a witch to <S%H2421>live.<s%> <S%H3784><s%>
Whosoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H7901>lieth<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> a <S%H929>beast<s%> shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%> <S%H4191><s%>
He that <S%H2076>sacrificeth<s%> unto any <S%H430>god,<s%> <S%H1115>save<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H905>only,<s%> he shall be utterly <S%H2763>destroyed.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3238>vex<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3905>oppress<s%> him: <S%H3588>for<s%> ye <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H1616>strangers<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H490>widow,<s%> or fatherless <S%H3490>child.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> thou afflict them in any <S%H6031>wise,<s%> <S%H6031><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3588>and<s%> they cry at <S%H6817>all<s%> <S%H6817><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, I will surely <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H8085><s%> their <S%H6818>cry;<s%>

And my <S%H639>wrath<s%> shall wax <S%H2734>hot,<s%> and I will <S%H2026>kill<s%> you with the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and your <S%H802>wives<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H490>widows,<s%> and your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H3490>fatherless.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> thou <S%H3867>lend<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> to any <S%H853>of<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H853>is<s%> <S%H6041>poor<s%> <S%H5973>by<s%> thee, thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> to him as a <S%H5383>usurer,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou <S%H7760>lay<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him <S%H5392>usury.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> thou at all take thy neighbor's raiment to <S%H2254>pledge,<s%> <S%H2254><s%> <S%H7453><s%> <S%H8008><s%> thou shalt <S%H7725>deliver<s%> it unto him by <S%H5704>that<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> goeth down: <S%H935><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> is his <S%H3682>covering<s%> <S%H905>only,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is his <S%H8071>raiment<s%> for his <S%H5785>skin:<s%> <S%H4100>wherein<s%> shall he <S%H7901>sleep?<s%> and it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H6817>crieth<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, that I will <S%H8085>hear;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H2587>gracious.<s%>
Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7043>revile<s%> the <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H779>curse<s%> the <S%H5387>ruler<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H309>delay<s%> to offer the first of thy ripe <S%H4395>fruits,<s%> and of thy <S%H1831>liquors:<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> shalt thou <S%H5414>give<s%> unto me.

Likewise <S%H3651><s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> with thine <S%H7794>oxen,<s%> and with thy <S%H6629>sheep:<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> his <S%H517>dam;<s%> on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> thou shalt <S%H5414>give<s%> it me.

And ye shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> unto me: <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall ye <S%H398>eat<s%> any <S%H1320>flesh<s%> that is torn of <S%H2966>beasts<s%> in the <S%H7704>field;<s%> ye shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> it to the <S%H3611>dogs.<s%>
